revision.comment: Created page with "Probably: The circles of Gomer or, an essay towards an investigation and introduction of the English, as an universal language...by Rowland Jones. (London : Sold by S. Crowde..."
revision.text: Probably: The circles of Gomer or, an essay towards an investigation and introduction of the English, as an universal language...by Rowland Jones. (London : Sold by S. Crowder, in Pater-noster Row ; Richardson, and Urquhart, at the Royal Exchange ; P. Elmsley, in the Strand ; and J. Almon, in Piccadilly, 1771) http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/728273034
